mapper.select: SELECT ad_account_system AS "clientName", COUNT(ad_account_id) AS "totalCount", IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN account_status='1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ),0) AS "activeCount", IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN account_status='2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ),0) AS "disableCount" FROM ad_account WHERE ad_account_system = #{accountSystem}
